translations.translation: This is only what the previous peoples did.
This is just a habit of antiquated people.
This has been happening all along.
your preaching is nothing but ancient legends and we shall not face any torment".
“This is nothing but the tradition of former people.”
This is no other than Khuluq of the ancients,"
This is naught but a custom of the ancients;
this is nothing but the habit of the ancients,
This is but a fable of the men of old,
this is nothing but a habit of the ancients:
This in but a custom of the ancients.
These are nothing but the traditions of the ancients,
This is no other than a customary device of the ancients,
This is no other than the false-tales and religion of the ancients, [Tafsir At-Tabari, Vol. 19, Page 97]
That is nothing but a habit of the ancients,
This is nothing but morals of the ancients.
This is not but the custom of the former peoples,

[26:137] This, that you threaten us with, is merely the fabrication of the ancients, that is, their inventions and lies (a variant reading [for khalq, ‘fabrication’] is khuluq, ‘ethos’, in other words, this denial of resurrection to which we adhere is merely ‘the ethos of the ancients’, in other words, their nature and wont);

(This) that in which we are now (is but a fable of the men of old) the religion of the people of old; the religion of our forefathers; it is also said that this means: what you say is nothing but the invention of the people of old,

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text:
وقوله تعالى: { إِنْ هَـٰذَا إِلاَّ خُلُقُ ٱلأَوَّلِينَ } معناهُ إخْتِلاقٌ من الأَولين
 وقال: دَأبُهُمْ
 وقال: دِينُهُمْ

translations.translation:
And His saying, {Indeed, this is no more than the [creation of] the first [men].} Its meaning is the creation of the first [men].
 He said: "Their way is to..."
 And he said, "Their religion"

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
{ إِنْ هَـٰذَا } أي: ما كنا عليه من الأخلاق ما هي { إِلاَّ خُلُقُ } آبائنا { ٱلأَوَّلِينَ } [الشعراء: 137] وعادتهم المستمرة
 وسنتهم السنية المأثورة لنا منهمز
